content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am pleased to discuss the rental price with you. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the excellent location and condition of the apartment, I propose starting the negotiations at 550 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is an excellent starting point. However, I believe the apartment's value is much higher. How about 650 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I understand your perspective on the apartment's value, I'm looking for a more competitive offer. I would gladly accept 600 Euros as a monthly rent.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, 600 euros is still too low for such a prime location. I am willing to accept 625 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After considering the location advantages, I concede that 625 Euros per month is a fairer offer. I agree to the price of 625 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
